title: Team Contracts Day 4 Calculation issue
content:
On the fourth day of the “Team Contracts” event, a calculation error occurred.

At the data center housing the equipment responsible for data analytics, there were power issues, and part of the data was not transmitted to the analytics system. We promptly fixed the problem, loaded the missing data, performed a recalculation, and all players have now received their well-earned points.
